scripts.vehicles-import: docker cp ./app_api/models/vehicles-test.json sp-rentdrive-mongodb:/vehicles-test.json ; docker exec -it sp-rentdrive-mongodb mongoimport --db RentDrive --collection Vehicles --mode upsert --upsertFields make --jsonArray --file vehicles-test.json; docker exec -it sp-rentdrive-mongodb rm -rf vehicles-test.json; docker exec -it sp-rentdrive-mongodb bash -c "mongo RentDrive --eval 'db.Vehicles.find().forEach(function(dokument) { for (var i = 0; i < dokument.reviews.length; i++) { dokument.reviews[i]._id = ObjectId() } db.Vehicles.update({ "_id" : dokument._id }, dokument) })'"
